SourcePage.title: Sources Management
SourcePage.description: Subscription sources you are interested in, verify your dashboard

confirmDelete.title: Delete RSS Source
confirmDelete.message: This will permanently delete this source and all its signals. This action cannot be undone.

AgentSetup.title: Agent Setup
AgentSetup.description: Let AI Agents automatically discover and use website features
AgentSetup.quickStartSteps:
1. Copy the MCP server URL
2. Add the server to your Agent configuration
3. The Agent will automatically discover available tools
AgentSetup.loginRequired: Please login first to generate an API Key
AgentSetup.apiKeyHint: Login to generate an API Key
AgentSetup.apiKeyWarning: The key will only be shown once, please save it securely
AgentSetup.claudeDesktopHint: Copy the following configuration to Claude Desktop settings
AgentSetup.authHint: Add API Key to request header:

tools.get_signals: Get signal list, filter by source type, date range, tags
tools.get_signal_detail: Get detailed content of a single signal
tools.get_sources: Get available sources and subscription status
tools.read_article: AI reads article content, returns summary or translation
tools.subscribe_source: Subscribe or unsubscribe from a source
tools.search_signals: Search signals by keywords in title, summary, tags
tools.get_insights: Get daily insights including trend analysis, causality analysis
